channel.title: Magic handler help
channel.description:
im having problems trying to make a magic handler and its with the npcindex i dont know how to fix it and id really apperciate if some one could help me would i have to add it in my method? mnpc(...,...,npcIndex) { or would i have to do something entirly diffrent?

item.title: Magic handler help
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

im having problems trying to make a magic handler and its with the npcindex
i dont know how to fix it and id really apperciate if some one could help me
would i have to add it in my method?
mnpc(…,…,npcIndex) {
or would i have to do something entirly diffrent?
